information: Anklam Extrakt GmbH produces and distributes premium-quality plant extracts for the pharmaceutical, food and dietary supplement industries. In addition to our premium extracts, we also supply our unique branded ingredients Delphinol ® and MaquiBright ®. As a young and up-and-coming company, we are just as committed to advancement as we are to sustainability. As such, our focus is not only on ultra-modern processes and production facilities, but also on traditional and enduring values such as honesty, fairness, reliability, expertise and experience. UNLIMITED EXTRACT SOLUTIONS. MADE IN GERMANY.
